titlestmt.titleproper: Philadelphia City Passenger Railway Company records 1875-1883
titlestmt.sponsor: This collection-level EAD record is a product of the Philadelphia Area Consortium of Special Collections Libraries (PACSCL) Consortial Survey Initiative, which was funded by the Andrew W. Mellon Foundation.

profiledesc.creation: Machine-readable finding aid generated in EAD from data in the PACSCL Consortial Survey Database on 12/21/2012

did.unittitle: Philadelphia City Passenger Railway Company records
did.repository: University of Delaware Special Collections Department Morris Library, 181 South College Avenue Newark, DE 19717-5267

bioghist.p: The Philadelphia Passenger Railway Company was chartered in 1859 and operated on Chestnut and Walnut Streets between the depot and 42nd Street.

scopecontent.p: This volume records interest on bonds, 1875-1883. Entries list stockholders, the amount of their investments, the amount of interest received, and the stockholders' signatures.

accessrestrict.p: The collection is open for research.

acqinfo.p: Provenance: Gift of Barry and Sue Moyerman
